cleaned_text: holistic medicine [ (hoh-lis-tik) ] An approach to medicine that emphasizes treating the person as a whole, with special attention to the interconnections of the mind and body and of the [systems](/browse/system) within the body. Holistic medicine stresses the patient's role in health care through such means as positive attitudes, sound diet, and regular exercise.
